column4: hi folks... beagle question: beagle search doesn't find anything in my system (i had installed it on two machines two month ago, the first days works ok, but now nothing)
hi folks... beagle question: beagle search doesn't find anything in my system (i had installed it on two machines two month ago, the first days works ok, but now nothing)
anyone can help me with my beagle problem?
I couldn't get Beagle to find any of my home files, even after "walking the dog", adding indexing extensions to my filesystems, etc. :(
